name: Sahm-Ken Feralo
content: Sahm-Ken Feralo was a Cerean male who served as a senator in the Imperial Senate of the Galactic Empire. Senator Feralo was the father of Ko-Tun Feralo, a soldier of the Rebel Alliance who led a rebel cell with the military rank of quartermaster. Despite serving the Empire, Senator Feralo was in actuality a spy for the Rebel Alliance, and once his cover was exposed, he needed to be extracted from his safehouse in Coruscant.
